SS screams again.  When the blast clears he fires his boa (if it hits 
at this hieght Epyons as good as slagged), before transforming into a 
dragon and flying top speed towards Darkfates base.

OOC:  Oh well at least I feel like he did a better than any of my 
other chars.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Epyon::
> 
> The whip is still undamaged, but Epyon released its grip on SS.
> Epyon then fires another massive energy blast from the orb on his 
chest,
> that is now recharged from its last use. The beam should ingulf SS'
> whole boddy.
